cover_letter.prompt: Given my resume and the job info provided, can you draft a cover letter that highlights my strengths for this role and describes me as a great candidate for the hiring manager? Make sure to mention only the information provided in my resume that make me a good candidate for the position. Please reply ONLY with the cover letter draft, no other text.
